description.intro: I am Michel, currently in the process of a career change for the past two years. I am curious about various fields, continuously enhancing my skills, and would be delighted to learn to master new tools. Share my expertise, and build upon the skills I have already acquired !

experience.description0: The project aims to modernize their vehicle management platform using more advanced technologies. The goal is to transition their clientele to the new user interface.
experience.description1: The essence of the project is to optimize the parking management platform, while providing a more user-friendly experience through interface enhancements.
experience.description2: The project aims to design custom websites in response to client requests.
experience.description3: The project aims to enhance Xoopar's current website and revamp it into two versions for BtoB and BtoC customers, thereby streamlining the ordering process.
experience.description4: The project involves reorganizing the Solt Expertiz website to provide better service and an enhanced presentation.
experience.description5: The project aims to design attractive graphic elements and websites for the clientele.
